import requests
from requests.auth import HTTPBasicAuth
import json
jira_id="""${jira_id}""".strip()
url = "https://sbemea.atlassian.net/rest/api/2/issue/"+jira_id+"/comment"

auth = HTTPBasicAuth("karthik16m92@gmail.com", "ATATT3xFfGF0AK7i9zPMb68IGiPF8ywQKdefSowaAyEQLLLnL4v5fFqZy5j1bZDc8BvpvSwuXSV6d5ThMpZlTHpDWLm3nUZ6toTYCUAMR8GaFbsD0vC8XLZLBmwd7hiFh9LDJFiddFey_w5Dh_jiKHe7oO_Df6HBm15hLRH2d5xQ9tlz3h_wr2w=0F817111")

headers = {
  "Accept": "application/json",
  "Content-Type": "application/json"
}

payload = json.dumps( {
    "body": "${failed_output}"
})

response = requests.request(
   "POST",
   url,
   data=payload,
   headers=headers,
   auth=auth
)

print(json.dumps(json.loads(response.text), sort_keys=True, indent=4, separators=(",", ": ")))
